title: One Pot - 120+ Easy Meals from Your Skillet, Slow Cooker, Stockp
description:
One Pot: 120+ Easy Meals from Your Skillet, Slow Cooker, Stockpot, and More
by Editors of Martha Stewart Living
Clarkson Potter | September 2014 | ISBN-10: 0307954412 | ePUB | 115 pages | 42.8 mb

Using just one pan, you can stew, steam, sautÃƒÂ©, simmer, braise, or roast your way to a fuss-free mealÃ¢â‚¬â€and minimal cleanup to boot.
At the end of a busy day, you want to serve a delicious home-cooked dinner, a complete, all-in-one meal that can be prepared with little effort and few pans to wash. The editors of Martha Stewart Living present a brand-new collection of 120 recipesÃ¢â‚¬â€organized by vesselÃ¢â‚¬â€to help you do just that, all while adding savory new dishes to your weekly rotation.
One Pot is an exciting new way to approach everyday cooking: Imagine perfect pasta dishes for which everything goes in the pot at once (yes, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pasta, tomato, garlic, basil, and water all cooked together), dinner-party ready roasts with tender vegetables, and down-home casseroles, along with wholesome fish, chicken, and vegetarian dishes. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get incredible flavor payoff from dishes such as comforting Chicken and Dumplings, easy Baked Risotto with Carrots and Squash, healthy Broiled Striped Bass with Tomatoes, hearty Pork Chops with Bacon and Cabbage, and the delectable Skillet Chocolate-Chip CookieÃ¢â‚¬â€each of which takes less than an hour from start to finish. Here, too, are a dozen outstanding recipes for surprising and simple desserts that can be ready when you are.
With chapters devoted to your essential cooking vesselsÃ¢â‚¬â€stockpot, skillet, slow cooker, and moreÃ¢â‚¬â€this book is sure to streamline your meals and to satisfy the people you share them with.
